name: Y&R Austin
description:
Y&R Austin is an advertising and marketing agency that turns marketing complexities into compelling ideas. 

For more than 25 years, the agency has created powerful connections between brands and their customers in industries such as enterprise technology, consumer electronics, managed services, healthcare, telecom and supply chain management and logistics. 
Industry leaders, including AMD, Xerox, Dell, and SanDisk have relied onY&R Austin for innovative marketing solutions.
